resources.string: Sorry! This device does not support Rotation Vector Sensor.
Couldn\'t launch wallpaper chooser. You can still activate Beleco by choosing \"Live Wallpapers\" in your home screen wallpaper picker.

ver 1.03 - Mar 15, 2017

Made by dklaputa.
Source code in GitHub

Many thanks to these open source projects:

Muzei Live Wallpaper
by Roman Nurik

GLWallpaperService
by Robert Green, Mark F. Guerra, and others

EventBus
by greenrobot

Thanks to this beautiful icon pack:

Beautiful Flat Icons
by Nick Roach

Beleco Live Wallpaper can produce a parallax effect by slightly offsetting the position of the wallpaper.
*Rotation Vector Sensor is required to obtain the device\'s rotation angle data in real time. You can check whether your device supports it by rotating the device and seeing whether the cube below changes its perspective.
